verses.roman:
dekhite dekhite vṛkṣa ha-ila phalita
pākila aneka phala, sabei vismita

synonyms: dekhite dekhite—as people were seeing; vṛkṣa—the tree; ha-ila—became; phalita—fully grown with fruits; pākila—ripened; aneka—many; phala—fruits; sabei—every one of them; vismita—struck with wonder.
translation: As people looked on, the tree became fully grown, with fruits that fully ripened. Thus everyone was struck with wonder.
